commit.author: Isaac Slaughter <isaac.slaughter@gmail.com>
commit.message:
Update nih, usaspend, ophil, mellon (#42)

* Update NIH API version to V2

* Merge grants with identical IDs

* Update ophil ID selector

* Update to GraphQL API

* Ensure NSF results have identical fields

* Raise warning in usaspending if dates not available

* Add delay between requests to Mellon

* Update filtering syntax for NIH v2 API

* Require exact match in NSF search

* Ensure NSF results have identical fields

* ensure we have all records for each usaspend ID

* Add 'stats' bindings for na.pass

* Test installing covr w/ install.packages

* Update looping test for new NIH search

* Add libcurl4-openssl-dev

* Add looping to carnegie
